name: Muscle Party
description:
Our first Vr Game so this game is available for VR only.

You have to survive in this gym and collect 10 Whey protein to get out before you caught by Billy Harington

This is demo version so your experience might be short but feel free to comment our game to make this game better in positive way.

Now available in English Language

How to play 

you have to collect Whey protein by using controller cursor, Aim and Drag it to your face and it will count.

GOOD LUCK

If you like our game.pls follow us on Twitter Little Duck (@LittleDuckStudi) / Twitter
